makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Terreny Aberrant
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the <$name$> is doughlike terreny difícil. Each creature that starts its turn in that area ha de salvar per Força (CD 10). Si falla, have its speed reduced to 0 fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorció d'Àcida
entries: Whenever the <$name$> is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Adhesive
entries: The <$name$> adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (CD 13 per escapar). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the <$name$> can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forma d'Aire
entries: The <$name$> pot entrar a l'espai que ocupa una criatura hostil i quedar-s'hi. Pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Angelic Weapons (Deva)
entries: Els atacs armats de The <$name$>'s són màgics. When the <$name$> hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} de dany radiant.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Angelic Weapons (Planetar)
entries: Els atacs armats de The <$name$>'s són màgics. When the <$name$> hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 5d8} de dany radiant.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Angelic Weapons (Solar)
entries: Els atacs armats de The <$name$>'s són màgics. When the <$name$> hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 6d8} de dany radiant.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The <$name$> is {@condition incapacitat} while in the area of an {@i camp antimàgic}. If targeted by {@i dissipar màgia}, the <$name$> ha de salvar per Constitució contra la CD de salvada de conjur de qui el llança. Si falla, cau {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Emboscar
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Amorf
entries: The <$name$> pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Amfibi
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the <$name$> scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: Si the <$name$> rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the <$name$> is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Pell Punxeguda (Diable d'Espines)
entries: A l'inici de cada torn seu, the <$name$> deals 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany perforant to any creature grappling it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ésser de Càrrega
entries: The <$name$> es considera Gran quant es calcula la seva capacitat de càrrega.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Berserk (Gòlem d'Argila)
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with 60 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Berserk (Gòlem de Carn)
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The <$name$>'s creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk <$name$>, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The <$name$> must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make una tirada de Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) amb CD 15. If the check succeeds, the <$name$> ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the <$name$> might go berserk again.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sentits Cecs
entries: The <$name$> no pot fer servir la visió a cegues mentre estigui {@condition eixordat} i no pugui olorar.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vinculat
entries: The <$name$> està vinculat màgicament a un amulet. As long as the <$name$> and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the <$name$> to travel to it, and the <$name$> knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the <$name$> is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (arrodoneix a l'alta) is transferred to the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Coratge
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the <$name$> hits with it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Charge (Home Senglar)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força (CD 13). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Pell Camaleònica
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Confer Fire Resistència
entries: The <$name$> can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Consumir Vida (Foguet Follet)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the <$name$> can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitució saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the <$name$> regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the <$name$> corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the <$name$> is destroyed after dealing damage.
The <$name$> can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forma Corrosiva
entries: Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 4 ({@dice 1d8}) de dany d'àcid. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the <$name$> corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the <$name$> is destroyed after dealing damage.
The <$name$> can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Transferir Dany (Cloaker)
entries: Quan està enganxada a una criatura, the <$name$> només rep la meitat del dany que li fan (arrodoneix a la baixa), i la criatura a qui està enganxada rep l'altra meitat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Transferir Dany (Catifa d'Asfixia)
entries: While it està apresant a una criatura, the <$name$> només rep la meitat del dany que li fan, and the creature {@condition grappled} by the <$name$> takes the other half.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadàver Detonant (Dust Mephit)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Tota criatura a 5 peus de it must then succeed on a DC 10 Constitució saving throw or be {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. A {@condition encegat} creature pot repetir la salvada on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadàver Detonant (Magma Mephit)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Tota criatura a 5 peus de it must then succeed on a DC 11 Destresa saving throw, taking 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadàver Detonant (Magmin)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Tota criatura a 10 peus de it ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 11), taking 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. Flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint en aquella àrea s'encenen.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadàver Detonant (Ice Mephit)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Tota criatura a 5 peus de it must then succeed on a DC 10 Destresa saving throw, taking 4 ({@dice 1d8}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadàver Detonant (Steam Mephit)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Tota criatura a 5 peus de it must then succeed on a DC 10 Destresa saving throw, taking 4 ({@dice 1d8}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Acaballes de la Mortalitat (Balor)
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes, and tota criatura a 30 peus de it ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 20), taking 70 ({@dice 20d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area que ningú estigui portant o vestint, and it destroys the <$name$>'s weapons.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the <$name$>'s darkvision.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Atac en Picat (Aarakocra)
entries: If the <$name$> is flying and dives at least 30 feet. straight toward a target and then hits it amb un atac armat cos a cos, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage to the target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The <$name$> knows if it hears a lie.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resiliència Duergar
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition fascinat} or {@condition paralitzat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Busseig Terrestre
entries: The <$name$> pot excavar a través de pedra i terra no-màgica i no treballada. Fent això, the <$name$> no pertorba el material per on passa.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ecolocalització
entries: The <$name$> no pot fer servir la visió a cegues mentre estigui {@condition eixordat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Final Elemental (Djinni)
entries: If the <$name$> dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the <$name$> was wearing or carrying.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Final Elemental (Efreeti)
entries: If the <$name$> dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the <$name$> was wearing or carrying.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The <$name$> can't wear or carry anything.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trot Etèri
entries: the <$name$> pot, com a acció bonus, anar del Pla Material al Pla Etèri o viceversa.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Evasió
entries: If the <$name$> is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, the <$name$> instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rastrejador Infal·lible
entries: The <$name$> is given a quarry by its summoner. The <$name$> knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The <$name$> also knows the location of its summoner.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Animated Armor)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal suit of armor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Awakened Shrub)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal shrub.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Awakened Tree)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal tree.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Cloaker)
entries: While the <$name$> remains motionless without it's underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Mantombra)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Flying Sword)
entries: While the <$name$> remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Gàrgola)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un inanimate statue.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Llim Gris)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un oily pool or wet rock .

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Ice Mephit)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un shard of ice ordinary.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Magma Mephit)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un mound of magma ordinary.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Mimic)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un object ordinary.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Roper)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Catifa d'Asfixia)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal rug.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Xisclador)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un fong normal.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Treant)
entries: Si <$name$> es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal tree.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Falsa Aparença (Fong Violeta)
entries: Quan the <$name$> es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un fong normal.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and magic can't put the <$name$> to sleep.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fear Aura (Pit Fiend)
entries: Any creature hostile to the <$name$> that starts its turn within 20 feet of the <$name$> ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 21), unless the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition acovardit} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s Fear Aura durant les properes 24 hores.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the <$name$> includes its Carisma bonus.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorció de Foc
entries: Whenever the <$name$> is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura de Foc (Balor)
entries: At the start of each of the <$name$>'s turns, tota criatura a 5 peus de rep 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de foc, i els objectes inflamables a l'àrea que ningú estigui portant o vestint s'encenen. Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de foc.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forma de Foc (Elemental de Foc)
entries: The <$name$> pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema. Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de foc. A més, the <$name$> pot entrar a l'espai que ocupa una criatura hostil i quedar-s'hi. El primer cop que entra a l'espai d'una criatura en un torn, aquesta rep 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de foc and catches fire; fins que algú, com a acció, apagui el foc, the creature takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de foc a l'inici de cada torn seu.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The <$name$> no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Llibertat de Moviments
entries: The <$name$> ignora el terreny difícil, i els efectes màgics no li poden reduir la velocitat o deixar-lo {@condition restrained}. Pot gastar 5 peus de moviment per a escapar de lligams no-màgics o d'estar {@condition grappled}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Congelar-se
entries: If the <$name$> takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet fins el final del seu proper torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Gibbering (Boca Embarbussada)
entries: The <$name$> babbles incoherently while it can see any creature i no està {@condition incapacitat}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the <$name$> and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Saviesa saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma contra màgia.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Grappler
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Grasping Tendrils (Roper)
entries: The <$name$> can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Força check against it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Escalfor Corporal (Azer)
entries: Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de foc.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Escalfor Corporal (Remorhaz)
entries: Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de foc.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Escalfor Corporal (Salamàndrid)
entries: Si una criatura toca the <$name$> i l'impacta amb un atac cos a cos mentre hi està a 5 peus rep 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany de foc.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Armes Ígnies (Azer)
entries: Any metal melee weapon the <$name$> wields deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) de dany de foc on a hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Armes Ígnies (Salamàndrid)
entries: Any metal melee weapon the <$name$> wields deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) de dany de foc on a hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hellish Rejovenir (Lemure)
entries: A <$name$> that dies in els Nou Inferns comes back to life with all its hit points in {@dice 1d10} days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with aigua beneïda.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Armes Infernals (Erinyes)
entries: Els atacs armats de The <$name$>'s són màgics and deal an extra 13 ({@dice 3d8}) de dany de verí on a hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Crocodile)
entries: The <$name$> pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Cocodril Gegant)
entries: The <$name$> pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Giant Octopus)
entries: While out of water, the <$name$> can hold its breath durant 1 hora.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Hydra)
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath durant 1 hora.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Killer Whale)
entries: The <$name$> pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Llangardent)
entries: The <$name$> pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Octopus)
entries: While out of water, the <$name$> can hold its breath durant 30 minuts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath (Pleiosaure)
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath durant 1 hora.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aparença Horrorosa (Saga de Mar)
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> and can see the <$name$>'s true form ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 11). Si falla, the creature is {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the <$name$> is within line of sight. si supera, l'efecte s'acaba. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a <$name$>'s Aparença Horrorosa durant les properes 24 hores.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the <$name$>'s true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The <$name$> can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, terreny difícil composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Il·luminació Ígnia (Magmin)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the <$name$> can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the <$name$> desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Illumination (Azer)
entries: The <$name$> desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Illumination (Elemental de Foc)
entries: The <$name$> desprèn llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Illumination (Giant Fire Beetle)
entries: The <$name$> desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Illumination (Nightmare)
entries: The <$name$> desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The <$name$> és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The <$name$> pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. rep 5 ({@dice 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el torn dins d'un objecte.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Inescrutable
entries: The <$name$> is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) made to ascertain the <$name$>'s intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The <$name$> is {@condition invisible}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aroma de Ferro
entries: The <$name$> can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bona Vista i Oïda
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista, hearing o l'olfacte.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bona Vista
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista o l'olfacte.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Enteniment Laberíntic
entries: The <$name$> can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the <$name$> falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sensible a la Llum
entries: Si està en llum forta, the <$name$> té desavantatge a tirades d'impacte i de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que depenguin de la vista.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Quan the <$name$> hagi de rebre dany elèctric, no rep mal sinò que recupera la meitat de dany elèctric en punts de vida.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Telepathy (Otyugh)
entries: The <$name$> can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Telepathy (Pseudodrac)
entries: The <$name$> can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Amfibietat Limitada (Sahuagin)
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunitat Màgica Limitada (Rakshasha)
entries: The <$name$> can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. Té avantatge a salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a salvar contra encanteris i altres efectes màgics.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The <$name$>'s són màgics.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Avantatge Marcial (Hobgòblin)
entries: Un cop per torn, the <$name$> fa 7 ({@dice 2d6}) de dany extra a una criatura que impacti amb un atac armat si l'objectiu està a 5 peus d'un aliat de the <$name$> que no estigui {@condition incapacitat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mimicry (Saga Verda)
entries: The <$name$> pot imitar sons d'animals i veus humanoides. Una criatura que la senti pot saber que són imitacions si supera una tirada de  DC 14 Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mimicry (Raven)
entries: The <$name$> can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. Una criatura que la senti pot saber que són imitacions si supera una tirada de  DC 10 Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fugida Boira (Vampir)
entries: When it es queda a 0 punts de vida outside its resting place, the <$name$> transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition inconscient}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its <$name$> form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its <$name$> form. It is then {@condition paralitzat} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Núvol Llefiscós (Aboleth)
entries: While underwater, the <$name$> is surrounded by transformative mucus. Si una criatura toca the <$name$> or that hits it with a melee attack mentre hi està a 5 peus it ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 14). On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature només pot respirar a sota l'aigua.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Caps Múltiples (Hydra)
entries: The <$name$> has five heads. While it has more than one head, the <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.
Whenever the <$name$> takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the <$name$> dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The <$name$> regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The <$name$> can take the {@action Destravar-se} or {@action Amagar-se} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cub de Llim (Cub Gelatinós)
entries: The <$name$> takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the <$name$>'s Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Creatures inside the <$name$> can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the <$name$> can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the <$name$>. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Força check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.
The <$name$> can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Percepció Forània
entries: The <$name$> can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Pla Etèri. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de <$name$>'s no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Mirada Petrificant (Basilisk)
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> and the two of them can see each other, the <$name$> can force the creature to make a DC 12 Constitució saving throw if the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature magically begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. Ha de repetir la salvada al final del seu proper torn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, la criatura es queda {@condition petrificat} until freed by the restabliment superior spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the <$name$> fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the <$name$> in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the <$name$> sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó (Lion)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 13). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó (Panther)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 12). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó (Saber-Toothed Tiger)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó (Tiger)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 13). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó (Home Tigre)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Probing Telepathy (Aboleth)
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the <$name$>, the <$name$> learns the creature's greatest desires if the <$name$> can see the creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the <$name$> is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Enfurismar
entries: When the <$name$> reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the <$name$> can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make another attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reacció Ràpida
entries: The <$name$> pot prendre una reacció a cada torn de combat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Caps Reactius (Hydra)
entries: For each head the <$name$> has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the <$name$> can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Closca Reflectiva (Tarasca)
entries: Any time the <$name$> is targeted by un conjur {@spell missil màgic}, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the <$name$> is unaffected. On a 6, the <$name$> is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the <$name$>, turning the caster into the target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneració (Oni)
entries: The <$name$> regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn si té 1 punt de vida com a mínim.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneració (Guardià-Escut)
entries: The <$name$> regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn si té 1 punt de vida com a mínim.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneració (Troll)
entries: The <$name$> regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the <$name$> takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the <$name$>'s next turn. The <$name$> dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneració (Vampir)
entries: The <$name$> regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn si it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the <$name$> rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneració (Engendre de Vampir)
entries: The <$name$> regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn si it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the <$name$> rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rejovenir (Guardian Naga)
entries: If it dies, the <$name$> returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only un conjur {@spell desig} can prevent this trait from functioning.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rejovenir (Lich)
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed <$name$> gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rejovenir (Senyor de les Mòmies)
entries: A destroyed <$name$> gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the <$name$>'s heart.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rejovenir (Spirit Naga)
entries: If it dies, the <$name$> returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only un conjur {@spell desig} can prevent this trait from functioning.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Implacable (Boar)
entries: Si the <$name$> rep 7 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de vida.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Implacable (Giant Boar)
entries: Si the <$name$> rep 10 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de vida.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Implacable (Home Senglar)
entries: Si the <$name$> rep 14 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de vida.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Braó Embranzit (Lion)
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the <$name$> can long jump fins a 25 peus.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the <$name$> corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the <$name$> is destroyed after dealing damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sense Magic (Chuul)
entries: The <$name$> senses magic within 120 feet of it a voluntat. This trait otherwise works like the detectar màgia spell but isn't itself magical

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Escut Mental
entries: The <$name$> is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The <$name$> deals double damage to objects and structures.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènue o de foscor the <$name$> can take the {@action Amagar-se} action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Doppelganger)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Imp)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Mimic)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en unan object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Quàsit)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 ft. fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Succubus/Incubus)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the <$name$> loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Vampir)
entries: If the <$name$> isn't in sunlight or running water, it pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form. While in bat form, the <$name$> can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies. While in mist form, the <$name$> can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has una velocitat de vol de 20 peus, can hover, and pot entrar a l'espai que ocupa una criatura hostil i quedar-s'hi. A més, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It té avantatge a les tirades de Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Home Ós)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Home Senglar)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, (o tornar a la seva forma humanoide original). El seu bloc d'estats és el mateix excepte el seu tamany i la seva CA. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Home rata)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Home Tigre)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shapechanger (Home-llop)
entries: The <$name$> pot, com a acció, poliformar-se en una wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, (o tornar a la seva forma humanoide original). El seu bloc d'estats és el mateix excepte el seu tamany i la seva CA. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shark Telepatia
entries: The <$name$> can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Atac Furtiu (Assassin)
entries: Un cop per torn, the <$name$> deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the <$name$> doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Atac Furtiu (Spy)
entries: The <$name$> deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the <$name$> doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Emmagatzematge de Conjur (Guardià-Escut)
entries: A spellcaster who wears the <$name$>'s amulet can cause the <$name$> to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the <$name$>. The spell has no effect but is stored within the <$name$>. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the <$name$> casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, sense requerir components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide in snowy terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The <$name$> can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The <$name$> can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Salt Dempeus (Bulette)
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is fins a 30 peus and its high jump is fins a 15 peus, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Salt Dempeus (Frog)
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is fins a 10 peus and its high jump is fins a 5 peus, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Salt Dempeus (Giant Frog)
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is fins a 20 peus and its high jump is fins a 10 peus, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Salt Dempeus (Giant Toad)
entries: The <$name$>'s long jump is fins a 20 peus and its high jump is fins a 10 peus, with or without a running start.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fermesa
entries: The <$name$> can't be {@condition acovardit} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stench (Hezrou)
entries: Tota criatura que començi el torn a 10 peus d'abast of the <$name$> ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 14). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s stench for 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Surprise Attack (Bugbear)
entries: Si the <$name$> sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Surprise Attack (Doppelganger)
entries: Si the <$name$> sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cos Estable
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Camuflatge Petri
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made per a amagar-se en un terreny pedregós.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Debilitat a la Llum Solar
entries: While in sunlight, the <$name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sure Footed
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Camuflatge dels Aiguamolls
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide in swampy terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Bats)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Bats)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Poisonous Snakes)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Quippers)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Rats)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Swarm (Swarm of Ravens)
entries: The <$name$> can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain punts de vida temporals.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tactical Discipline
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regenerar Cua Fiblada (Mantícora)
entries: The <$name$> has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the <$name$> finishes a long rest.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vincle Telepàtic (Homúncul)
entries: While the <$name$> is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communcate telepathically.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vincle Telepàtic (Succubus/Incubus)
entries: The <$name$> ignores pot comunicar-se a qualsevol abast telepàticament amb una criatura que tingui {@condition fascinat}. Els dos no han d'estar al mateix pla d'existència.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge (Gorgona)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 16). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge (Elephant)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 12). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge (Mamut)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 18). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge (Triceratops)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 13). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Trampling Charge (Warhorse)
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força (CD 14). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the <$name$> can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Transparent (Cub Gelatinós)
entries: Even when the <$name$> is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) check to spot a <$name$> that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the <$name$>'s space while unaware of the <$name$> is surprised by the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sentir el Tresor
entries: The <$name$> can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Passeig pels Arbres
entries: Once on their turn, the <$name$> can use 10 feet of movement to step magically into one living tree within reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Tunneler (Cuc lila)
entries: The <$name$> can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Turning Defiance (Ghast)
entries: The <$name$> and any guls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The <$name$> és immune als efectes que expulsin no-morts.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bicefàlia
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, or knocked {@condition inconscient}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the <$name$> to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the <$name$> drops to 1 hit point instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> té avantatge a les tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made while underwater.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Vampir Weakness (Vampir)
entries: The <$name$> has the following flaws:
{@i Prohibició}. The <$name$> can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water}. The <$name$> takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart}. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the <$name$>'s heart while the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitat} in its resting place, the <$name$> is {@condition paralitzat} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}. The <$name$> takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. it té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Il·luminació Variable (Foguet Follet)
entries: The <$name$> sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius. The <$name$> can alter the radius as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Despert (Ettin)
entries: When one of the <$name$>'s heads is asleep, another head is awake.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Despert (Hydra)
entries: While the <$name$> sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The <$name$> només pot respirar a sota l'aigua.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forma Aquàtica (Elemental d'Aigua)
entries: The <$name$> pot entrar a l'espai que ocupa una criatura hostil i quedar-s'hi. Pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Water Susceptibility (Elemental de Foc)
entries: For every 5 feet the <$name$> moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Sentir el Tirarany
entries: Si està tocant un tirarany the <$name$> sap la posició exacta de tota criatura que també l'estigui tocant.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Web Walker
entries: The <$name$> ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
